Description: This ESP LTD EC-1000 is a superb, fast playing guitar with extra jumbo frets showing very little wear. The guitar can really dish out brutal metal sounds with the stock EMG 81/60 set.The condition is good very good with some surface scratches which could definitely be buffed out if the new owner desired. One tuning key has also lost its locking screw, but still functions perfectly as a normal tuner. This seems to be a fairly common problem with these ESP tuners. The serial number was also removed at some point in its life.The guitar ships in a good quality padded gig bag.CONSTRUCTION - Set-Thru SCALE - 24.75" BODY - Mahogany TOP - Quilted Maple NECK - 3Pc Mahogany FINGERBOARD - Pau Ferro FINGERBOARD RADIUS - 350mm FINISH - SEE THRU BLACK CHERRYNUT WIDTH - 42mm NUT TYPE - Molded NECK CONTOUR - Thin U FRETS/TYPE - 24 XJ HARDWARE COLOR - Black Nickel STRAP BUTTON - Standard TUNERS - LTD Locking BRIDGE - Tonepros Locking TOM & TailpieceNECK PU - EMG 60 BRIDGE PU - EMG 81 ELECTRONICS - Active ELECTRONICS LAYOUT - Vol/Vol/Tone/Toggle Switch
Title: ESP LTD EC-1000 QM - Black Cherry
